PreceptDef.label: expected
PreceptDef.description:
By properly cataloguing all the genetically modified animals on the Rim we are contributing to making the galaxy a better place.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists with "Low" expectations or higher will receive increasing mood boosts from the number of animals scanned and stored in the animal database. You need to have a database built for this to work.

li.label: no scans
li.description: We haven't yet scanned a single animal. We are neglecting our tasks.

li.description: We have scanned very, very few animals. We need to focus on our tasks.

li.description: We have scanned few animals. We need to focus on our tasks.

li.label: many scans
